H0.text: Who played factory boss Danny Baldwin in the British television soap ‘Coronation Street’. Bruce Jones

H1.text: Who played factory boss Danny Baldwin in the British television soap ‘Coronation Street’. John Bardon

H2.text: Who played factory boss Danny Baldwin in the British television soap ‘Coronation Street’. Brian Capron

H3.text: Who played factory boss Danny Baldwin in the British television soap ‘Coronation Street’. Bradley Walsh

A4.text: Brian Capron is best known for his role as serial killer Richard Hillman in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 2001 to 2003.
